title.rendered: Get to know the Samsung Galaxy S20 FE

content.rendered:
Samsung recently announced the release of their new budget friendly smartphone for 2020 so you’re going to need to get to know the Samsung Galaxy S20 FE. There’s an awful lot you’re bound to love about this brand new handset, it’s even got a super fun, new design! They’ve even made two versions of the handset so you can decide between 5G or 4G when purchasing your contract.

 

What’s it look like?

It’s not lying to say that one of the most important parts of any mobile phone is what it looks like. Without a super attractive design, people just aren’t going to purchase it. Surprisingly, you’ll get a plastic back with the S20 FE rather than an all glass experience. Either way, it offers a very attractive finish with an also satin design. There’s also very little on the back, which means you’re able to enjoy the full design to its full potential. The only things on the back are the Samsung logo and the camera system in a rectangular housing.

With such a high finish on the back of the phone, you’ll want to continue that with a great colour option. After all, there’s so much room on the back so you may as well love it. If you want to stick with a very classic, understated colour, the Cloud White and Cloud Navy are perfect options. They’re still incredibly attractive but have a more professional finish to them. For something a little more colourful, you can choose between the Cloud Mint, Cloud Lavender, Cloud Orange and Cloud Red options. All have the same high class finish with a pop of colour.

So, the back of the Samsung Galaxy S20 FE already sounds like something that everyone could fall in love with. Sticking with the high quality from Samsung, it also has a very impressive display. You’ll get to experience a 6.5 inch super AMOLED screen. The selfie camera has been reduced down to a tiny punch hole system whilst edge bezels have been removed to offer a much fuller view. Everything you view on this screen is going to show in a super high quality with more detail than ever before.

 

Outstanding Camera System

One thing that Samsung has been doing very well over the last year in particular is creating camera systems to love. On the back of the Samsung Galaxy S20 FE, you can find a triple lens camera that’s capable of big things. Inside this system is a 12MP main camera, 8MP telephoto lens and a 12MP ultra wide camera. With huge thanks to the main camera, you’ll be able to photograph the world in an extremely high quality fashion, even if there’s not too much light around outside. Every single photo this camera captures will be full of detail, textures and real life colours.

Next up in the S20 FE camera is the telephoto lens. This really is something to pay attention to as it allows you to capture photos in a whole new light. With this feature, you’ll be able to access a number of different focal lengths. These allow you to zoom right in and capture details from further away. The best part is you get to keep the high resolution when doing so. To finish off the camera system is the ultra wide lens. We’ve seen this a lot recently but it’s easy to see why. When you want to capture more in your photos, you just need to switch to this lens as it offers a much larger frame to shoot in.

Not only are you getting an impressive rear camera, but the Galaxy S20 FE also has a selfie camera that deserves to be talked about. Hiding in the tiny punch hole in the screen is a 32MP single lens. This is what is going to provide you the highest quality selfies you’ve ever seen. Capture self portraits with huge amounts of colour and detail with this amazing, top tier feature.

 

Behind the brains of the Samsung Galaxy S20 FE

Whilst super high quality features, such as the camera and overall design, are super important, the things that make this phone running are by far the most important. Inside the Samsung Galaxy S20 FE is a 4500mAg battery unit and it’s got some impressive power. On just one charge, this phone will allow you to go the entire day without the worry of a dead battery. When you do need to charge it up quickly, the phone supports fast charging 25W, fast wireless charging 15W, reverse wireless charging 4.5W and USE Power Delivery 3.0. Each addition is one that will make your life a whole lot easier.

There’s also been a huge uplift in what people are keeping on their phones nowadays. More and more people are working, gaming or just storing a lot of data on their mobile phones. For that reason, the Samsung S20 FE is available in either 128GB or 256GB of internal memory. Both these options will allow you to keep a lot of detail on your phones however, there is also the chance to add more. The SIM slot also holds a microSD card so that you can slip a memory card in whenever you’re running low.

 

More to love

Nowadays, there are so many different ways you can gain access to your phone. From passcodes to fingerprint sensors to face recognition, we seem to be progressing very quickly. To keep up with the times, the Galaxy S20 FE has an under display, optical fingerprint sensor. This gives you super secure access to the mobile phone, a lot more secure than a passcode actually. As you can set a number of different fingerprints on the phone, you won’t ever have to give out your passcode or risk it being memorised over your shoulder again.

 

Make sure you take a look at our best Samsung Galaxy S20 FE deals and pre order to be one of the first to get your hands on it. Pre order deals are available right now and we promise you’re not going to want to miss out on these outstanding prices.
